azureLocation.description: Azure Location or Azure region where to which the machines will be migrated.

currency.description: Currency in which prices should be reported.

percentile.description:
Percentile of the utilization data values to be considered while assessing
machines.

perfDataStartTime.description: Gets or sets the start time to consider performance data for assessment.

scalingFactor.description:
Percentage of buffer that user wants on performance metrics when recommending
Azure sizes.

timeRange.description:
Time Range for which the historic utilization data should be considered for
assessment.

lastHeartbeatUtc.description: Gets the collector last heartbeat time.

tenantId.description: Gets the tenant id of the AAD application.

agentProperties.description: Gets or sets the collector agent properties.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: Properties of the private endpoint connection.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

assessmentSolutionId.description: Assessment solution ARM id tracked by Microsoft.Migrate/migrateProjects.

customerStorageAccountArmId.description:
The ARM id of the storage account used for interactions when public access is
disabled.

customerWorkspaceId.description: The ARM id of service map workspace created by customer.

customerWorkspaceLocation.description: Location of service map workspace created by customer.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

publicNetworkAccess.description:
This value can be set to 'enabled' to avoid breaking changes on existing
customer resources and templates. If set to 'disabled', traffic over public
interface is not allowed, and private endpoint connections would be the
exclusive access method.

asyncCommitModeIntent.description: Gets or sets user preference indicating intent of async commit mode.

azureOfferCodeForVm.description: Gets or sets Azure Offer Code for VM.

azureSecurityOfferingType.description: Gets or sets a value indicating azure security offering type.
